chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x))

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
bottom = fix bottom (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else bottom m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec y (bottom m0 k0 z) then bottom m0 k0 x else bottom m0 k0 z else bottom m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
top = fix top (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else top m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x (top m0 k0 z) then top m0 k0 y else top m0 k0 z else top m0 k z end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
planar = fun m : fmap => genus m = 0 : fmap -> Prop
planar_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m < -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x))
planar_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (B m zero x)
betweene_bottom_x_top : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> betweene m (bottom m zero x) x (top m zero x)
expf_planar_rcp_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m
expf_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar (L m zero x y)
genus_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> genus (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) = genus m
nf_L_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> nf (L (B m zero x) zero x (A m zero x)) = nf m
weak_planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> expf m (cA_1 m one x) y -> planar m < -> planar (L m zero x y)
not_eqc_planar_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m zero x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_criterion_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar m -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y
planarity_crit_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m zero x y -> planar (L m zero x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m (cA_1 m one x) y)
disconnect_planar_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ eqc (B m zero x) x y
expf_planar_rcp_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m
expf_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar (L m one x y)
weak_planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> expf m x (cA m zero y) -> planar m < -> planar (L m one x y)
planarity_criterion_RCP_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
inv_hmap_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x))
planarity_crit_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let m0 := B m zero x in let y := A m zero x in planar m < -> planar m0 /\ (~ eqc m0 x y \/ expf m0 (cA_1 m0 one x) y)
planarity_criterion_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> planar (L m one x y) < -> ~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y)
planarity_crit_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar (L m one x y) < -> planar m /\ (~ eqc m x y \/ expf m x (cA m zero y))
cF_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (B m k x) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 (B m zero x) one (if eq_dart_dec (A m zero x) z then top m zero x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m zero x) z then x else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec (A m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then top m one x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then x else cA_1 m one (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z))
cA_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA m k z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = cA_1 m k z
face_cut_join_criterion_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in expf m y x0 < -> ~ expf (B m zero x) y x0
nf_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in nf (B m zero x) = nf m + (if expf_dec m y x0 then 1 else -1)
A_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A m k1 z
cA_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA m k1 z
A_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in A_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = A_1 m k1 z
cA_1_L_B_top_bot_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let k1 := dim_opp k in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k1 z = cA_1 m k1 z
other_faces_in_cut_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let y := A m zero x in let x0 := bottom m zero x in ~ expf m y x0 -> ~ expf m y z -> ~ expf m x0 z -> expf m z t < -> expf (B m zero x) z t
expf_B0_CS_1_b_prel2 : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m xh0_1 z x0 -> expf (B m zero x) xh0_1 z
expf_not_expf_B0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in expf (B m zero x) x_1 x0 < -> ~ expf m x0 xb0
not_eqc_planar_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> planar m -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m one x y)
A_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then nil else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then bottom m k x else A m k z)
expf_B0_CS_1_c : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> ~ expf m x_1 z /\ expf m z t -> expf (B m zero x) z t
inversion_planarity : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> planar (L m k x y) -> planar m
expf_B0_CS_1_a : forall (m : fmap) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 xb0 -> betweenf m x_1 z xb0 /\ betweenf m x_1 t xb0 -> expf (B m zero x) z t
A_1_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A_1 (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then nil else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then top m k x else A_1 m k z)
not_eqc_planar : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> prec_L m k x y -> ~ eqc m x y -> planar (L m k x y)
```intros m x inv succ planar. apply planarity_crit_0. exact inv. exact succ. exact planar. apply betweene_bottom_x_top. exact inv. exact succ. apply planar_B0. exact inv. exact succ.```

original: intros m x inv succ planar. apply planarity_crit_0. apply inv. apply succ. apply planar. apply betweene_bottom_x_top. apply inv. apply succ. apply planar_B0. apply inv. apply succ.
